subject: Using JUnit Inside Application Server?
msgSnippet: Hi, I m using Eclipse 3.2, Orion application server, J2EE 5.0, Oracle database. I ve written a jUnit test but it doesn t run since it doesn t run within the
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm using Eclipse 3.2, Orion application server, J2EE 5.0, Oracle
database.

I've written a jUnit test but it doesn't run since it doesn't run
within the application server "container" and so can't find the
database data-sources that I've setup.

How can I run jUnit unit tests inside an application server "container"?

Kind Regards,

Lennie De Villiers
